summary.span: 取得或設定檔案對話方塊的自訂位置清單。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of custom places for file dialog boxes.

value.span: 自訂位置清單。

span.span: The list of custom places.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從開始[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)]、 開啟和儲存檔案 對話方塊中，有**我的最愛連結**面板上，可讓使用者快速巡覽至不同的位置 對話方塊的左半部。Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location. 這些連結會呼叫自訂位置。These links are called custom places. 這個屬性可讓您修改您的應用程式會使用檔案對話方塊時，會出現的清單。This property allows you to modify the list that appears when your application uses a file dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultExt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定用來篩選所顯示之檔案清單的預設副檔名字串。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default extension string to use to filter the list of files that are displayed.

value.span: 預設副檔名字串。

span.span: The default extension string.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 副檔名字串必須包含前置句號。The extension string must contain the leading period. 例如，設定".txt"來選取所有文字檔案的屬性。For example, set the property to ".txt" to select all text files. 根據預設，屬性會嘗試判斷要篩選顯示的檔案清單中的擴充功能屬性。By default, the property attempts to determine the extension to filter the displayed file list from the property. 如果無法判別延伸模組，從屬性，將改為使用。If the extension cannot be determined from the property, will be used instead. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立，其中包含預設的檔案名稱和副檔名類型。The following example shows how to create an that contains a default file name and extension type. [!code-csharp[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)] [!code-vb[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/window1.xaml.vb#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)]

span.span: to return the location referenced; to return the shortcut location.

to set dereferencing behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已選取多個檔案名稱 (長度大於一) 然後包含第一個選取的檔案名稱。If more than one file name is selected (length of is greater than one) then contains the first selected file name. 如果未不選取任何檔案名稱，則此屬性包含而不是`null`。If no file name is selected, this property contains rather than `null`.

summary.span: 當使用者按一下 的 [開啟] 按鈕或 的 [儲存] 按鈕來選取檔案名稱時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user selects a file name by either clicking the **Open** button of the or the **Save** button of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者選取檔案名稱，但對話方塊關閉之前，可讓您處理選取項目之後引發。 is raised after the user selects a file name, but before the dialog closes, which allows you to process the selection. 使用者的選取項目如有需要，可以藉由設定取消屬性引數`true`。If required, the user's selection can be cancelled by setting the property of the argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定篩選條件字串，可決定在 或 中顯示的檔案類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the filter string that determines what types of files are displayed from either the or .

value.span: 包含篩選條件的 。

span.span: A that contains the filter.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示不套用任何篩選條件，而會顯示所有檔案類型。

span.span: The default is , which means that no filter is applied and all file types are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`null`或、 會顯示所有檔案和資料夾一律會都顯示。If is either `null` or , all files are displayed, and folders are always displayed. 您可以指定要顯示設定的檔案類型的子集屬性。You can specify a subset of file types to be displayed by setting the property. 每個檔案類型可以表示特定類型的檔案，如下所示：Each file type can represent a specific type of file, such as the following: - Word 文件 (\*.doc)Word Documents (\*.doc) - Excel 工作表 (\*.xls)Excel Worksheets (\*.xls) - PowerPoint 簡報 (\*.ppt)PowerPoint Presentations (\*.ppt) 或者，檔案類型可以代表一組相關的檔案類型，如下所示：Alternatively, a file type can represent a group of related file types, such as the following: - Office 檔案 (*.doc、.xls，*.ppt)Office Files (\*.doc, \*.xls, \*.ppt) - 所有檔案 (*。\*)All Files (*.\*) 若要指定所顯示之檔案類型的子集，您將設定與字串值的屬性 (*篩選條件字串*)，指定要篩選的檔案的一或多個類型。To specify a subset of the types of files that are displayed, you set the property with a string value (the *filter string*) that specifies one or more types of files to filter by. 以下顯示預期的格式的篩選字串：The following shows the expected format of the filter string: `FileType1[[|FileType2]...[|FileTypeN]]` 您可以使用下列格式來描述每個檔案類型：You use the following format to describe each file type: `Label|Extension1[[;Extension2]...[;ExtensionN]]` *標籤*部分是人類看得懂的字串值，描述的檔案類型，如下所示：The *Label* part is a human-readable string value that describes the file type, such as the following: - 「 Word 文件 」"Word Documents" - "Excel Worksheets""Excel Worksheets" - 「 PowerPoint 簡報""PowerPoint Presentations" - < Office 檔案 >"Office Files" - [所有檔案]"All Files" 每個檔案類型必須由至少一個描述*延伸*。Each file type must be described by at least one *Extension*. 如果有一個以上*延伸*使用時，每個*延伸*必須以分號分隔 （";"）。If more than one *Extension* is used, each *Extension* must be separated by a semicolon (";"). 例如: For example: - "\*.doc""\*.doc" - "\*.xls;""\*.xls;" - "\*.ppt""\*.ppt" - "\*.doc;\*.xls;\*.ppt""\*.doc;\*.xls;\*.ppt" - "*.\*""*.\*" 以下是有效的完整範例字串值：The following are complete examples of valid string values: - `Word Documents|*.doc` - `Excel Worksheets|*.xls` - `PowerPoint Presentations|*.ppt` - `Office Files|*.doc;*.xls;*.ppt` - `All Files|*.*` - `Word Documents|*.doc|Excel Worksheets|*.xls|PowerPoint Presentations|*.ppt|Office Files|*.doc;*.xls;*.ppt|All Files|*.*` 包含在篩選中每個檔案類型會加入做為個別項目**檔案類型：** 下拉式清單中的或，如下圖所示。Each file type that is included in the filter is added as a separate item to the **Files of type:** drop-down list in the or , as shown in the following figure. ![在 [開啟] 對話方塊中使用 FileDialog.Filter](~/add/media/filedialogfilterfigure1.png "中開啟的對話方塊中使用 FileDialog.Filter")![Using the FileDialog.Filter in the Open Dialog Box](~/add/media/filedialogfilterfigure1.png "Using the FileDialog.Filter in the Open Dialog Box") 使用者可以篩選此清單中選擇的檔案類型。The user can choose a file type from this list to filter by. 依預設，會選取的清單 （例如，第一個檔案類型） 的第一個項目時或隨即出現。By default, the first item in the list (for example, the first file type) is selected when the or is displayed. 若要指定要選取的其他檔案類型，您將設定屬性，才能顯示或(藉由呼叫)。To specify that another file type to be selected, you set the property before showing the or (by calling ). ## Examples 下列範例示範幾種類型的篩選字串時，可以透過設定屬性。The following examples demonstrate several types of filter strings that can be set by using the property. [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring1)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring1)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring2)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring7)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring7)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring8)] summary.span: 取得或設定目前在檔案對話方塊中選取之篩選條件的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in a file dialog.

value.span: ，其為所選取之篩選條件的索引。

span.span: The that is the index of the selected filter.

value.span: 預設為 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此索引是以 1 為基底，不 0 為基礎，因為基礎的相容性需求[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]。This index is 1-based, not 0-based, due to compatibility requirements with the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值用來顯示檔案對話方塊中，與目前的資料集的屬性值。This value is used to display a file dialog with the current set of property values. 實際的選項會公開為屬性指定的對話，但未載明做為公用的旗標值，此層級，所以這個屬性的用途是主要內部，用於實作的衍生的類別時和。The actual options are exposed as properties on the specific dialogs, but not documented as public flag values at this level, so the uses of this property are mainly internal, for use when implementing the derived classes and .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SafeFileName As String
public: property System::String ^ SafeFileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得僅包含所選檔案之檔名的字串。

span.span: Gets a string that only contains the file name for the selected file.

value.span: 僅包含所選檔案之檔名的 。

span.span: A that only contains the file name for the selected file.

value.span: 預設值為 ，而這也是沒有選取任何檔案或是已選取目錄時的值。

span.span: The default is , which is also the value when either no file is selected or a directory is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值是移除所有的路徑資訊。This value is the with all path information removed. 移除路徑會讓值適用於部分信任應用程式，因為它會防止應用程式探索本機檔案系統的相關資訊。Removing the paths makes the value appropriate for use in partial trust applications, since it prevents applications from discovering information about the local file system. 如果已選取多個檔案名稱 (長度大於 1) 這個屬性會包含第一個選取的檔案名稱。If more than one file name is selected (length of is greater than one) then this property contains only the first selected file name. 請參閱[XBAP 範例從安全的檔案上傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01206dd3-acc7-45ff-aeb9-502c20aaad2c)。See [Safe File Upload from an XBAP Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01206dd3-acc7-45ff-aeb9-502c20aaad2c).

span.span: An array of that contains one safe file name for each selected file.

value.span: 預設為具有值為 之單一項目的陣列。

span.span: The default is an array with a single item whose value is .

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果為 null 或、 會使用預設值，而當地語系化值，例如 「 做為儲存 」 或 「 開啟 」。If is null or , a default, localized value is used, such as "Save As" or "Open".

permission.span: 若要設定對話方塊的標題。

span.span: to set the dialog title.
